name: Education
description: We provide free academic education, scholarship, training and other incentives to the children.

name: Livelihood
description: We implement various schemes to provide livelihood and uplift the poor in society.

name: Healthcare
description: We are increasing awareness on Sanitization and providing people with access to better nutrition, clean water and toilets.

name: Women and Youth Empowerment
description: We focus on providing equal opportunities for women in the work field.
